description: Architectural elevation sheet showing all four exterior elevations (West, North, South, East) of the new ADU above existing garage, a proposed roof plan with ventilation calculations, roofing material specifications, roof elevation legends, and a metal guardrailing detail. Building height is 20'-11" from top of curb to midpoint of highest ridge. Attic ventilation calculations for 780 SF attic area included.
key_content: West Elevation: 17' NEW ADU ABOVE GARAGE, heat pump mini-split outdoor unit on wall, (N) electric heat pump water heater within framed stucco enclosure
North Elevation: 29'-8" at peak, 20'-11" from top of curb to midpoint of highest ridge, HVAC condenser visible, metal guardrail at deck
South Elevation: 20'-3" NEW ADU ABOVE GARAGE, (E) existing drive gate w/ garage 16' deep (in-out), 18' of garage
East Elevation: 17' NEW ADU ABOVE GARAGE, 20'-11" from top of curb to midpoint of highest ridge, external stairway
Building height: 20'-11" from top of curb to midpoint of highest ridge
Roofing material: Class A fire-rated 3-tab composition shingles over 30 lb felt underlayment, 7/16" OSB or 15/32" CDX plywood sheathing
Attic ventilation: NEW ATTIC AREA = 780 SF, ventilation @ 1/150 = 5.20 SF required
Proposed vents: dormer vents 24"x14" = 400.00 S.I., cable/soffit vents = 140.00 S.I., total net free ventilation = 540.00 S.I.
